channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Curam Social Program Management
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Curam Social Program Management

item.title: CVE-2022-22318|2024-09-16T22:25:40.177Z -- ibm -- curam%20social%20program%20management
item.description: IBM Curam Social Program Management 8.0.0 and 8.0.1 does not invalidate session after logout which could allow an authenticated user to impersonate another user on the system.

item.title: CVE-2022-22317|2024-09-16T19:20:48.066Z -- ibm -- curam%20social%20program%20management
item.description: IBM Curam Social Program Management 8.0.0 and 8.0.1 does not invalidate session after logout which could allow an authenticated user to impersonate another user on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 218281.

item.title: CVE-2018-1654|2024-09-16T21:57:16.048Z -- ibm -- curam%20social%20program%20management
item.description: IBM Curam Social Program Management 6.0.5, 6.1.1, 6.2.0, 7.0.1, and 7.0.3 could allow a remote attacker to conduct phishing attacks, using an open redirect attack. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to spoof the URL displayed to redirect a user to a malicious Web site that would appear to be trusted. This could allow the attacker to obtain highly sensitive information or conduct further attacks against the victim. IBM X-Force ID: 144747.
